definitions.body: waste, desolation, ruin;—abs. ´[[ח]] Le 26:31 + 15 t. + Ez Eze 38:8 (del. SyrVer Co) + Ez Eze 38:12 [[חרבה]] LXX Co for [[חרבות]]; pl. [[חֳרָבוֹת]] Ps 9:7 + 11 t. (Ez Eze 38:12, cf. supr.); cstr. [[חָרְבוֹת]] Is 5:17 + 7 t.; sf. [[חָרְבׂתַיִח]] Is 49:19; [[חָרְבׂתָיו]] Ezr 9:9; [[חָרְבׂתֶיהָ]] Is 51:3; [[חָרְבוֹתֶיהָ]] Is 44:26; [[חָרְבוֹתֵיהֶם]] Ps 109:10 + 2Ch 34:6 (cf. [[חֶרֶב]] and infr.); (chiefly mid. and late Heb. Is:Is 2 8 t.; Je 10 t. Ez 14 t.—incl. Eze 38:8, q. del. Co);—

waste, ruin, of cities of Israel Le 26:31, Le 26:33 (H); Judah Is 44:26, Is 49:19 (‖[[שׁׂמְמׂת]]), Is 58:12 ([[בנה]]), Je 25:18, Je 27:17, Je 44:2, Je 44:6, Ez Eze 5:14; ruins of Jerusalem Is 52:9, Da 9:2; also Ez Eze 35:4; cf. Mal 1:4 (c. [[בנה]]), Ez Eze 36:10 (c. [[בנה]]) v:Eze 36:33 (id.); Egypt Ez Eze 29:9, Eze 29:10 (in both ‖[[שְׁמָמָה]]; [[חרבות חׂרֶב]] in v:Eze 29:10); ruin of temple Ezr 9:9; = ruined dwellings Ps 109:10; cf. 2Ch 34:6, where rd. perh. [[בְּחָרְבׂתֵיהֶם]] for [[בּחר בתיהם]] (v. [[חֶרֶב]] sub III. [[חרב]]); Je 22:5; in gen. ruins (si vera 1., v. Di; obj. of [[בנה]]) Job 3:14; ´[[כוס ח]] Ps 102:7 an owl of a ruin.

of land: waste place amid ruins Is 5:17, cf. Is 51:3 (‖[[מִדְבָּר]], [[עֲרָבָה]]); land a desolation Je 7:34, Je 44:22, Ez Eze 25:13 (Edom) Je 25:11, Is 64:10 and Ez Eze 33:24, Eze 33:27 (of Judah), cf. Ez Eze 13:4, ´[[כְשֻׁעָלִים בח]] sim. of the prophets; [[הַשּׁׂמֵמוֹת]] ´[[הח]] Ez Eze 36:4 (of Israel); of desolation of enemies of Isr. Ps 9:7 ([[לָנֶ֫חַח]] ´[[ח]]); [[עולם]] ´[[ח]] = old ruins Is 61:4 (c. [[בנה]]); elsewhere perpetual ruin, desolation Je 25:9, Je 49:13 (cities of Bosra); [[מעולם]] ´[[ה]] Ez Eze 26:20 (sim. of Tyre).
